mapper.select: select questions.id as q_id, questions.title as q_title, questions.question as q_question, answers.id as a_id, answers.answer as a_answer, answers.question_id as a_question_id from questions left join answers on questions.id = answers.question_id order by q_id desc, a_id desc;
mapper.insert: insert into questions(title, question, user_id) values(#{title}, #{question}, #{userId});
mapper.update: update questions set title = #{title}, question = #{question} where id = #{id};
